description: This file defines a readme generator agent for a software project, importing necessary modules and creating an agent instance with specific instructions for generating a README file based on repository details.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that performs tasks based on provided models and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: GithubTools
classes.description: Provides tools for interacting with GitHub repositories.

classes.name: LocalFileSystemTools
classes.description: Provides tools for interacting with the local file system.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response, possibly in markdown format.
